verbs.description: [ARG2: haystack supper] [V: served] [ARG1: as the main dish] [ARGM-LOC: at our family reunion buffet] this flavorful layered taco - style dish was a true crowd - pleaser folks were pleasantly surprised to find a rice layer and everyone enjoys the creamy cheese sauce —jill steiner hancock minnesota
